description: The graphics looks older, less polished. I like only the "tux" table in Emilia Pinball. But it's nevertheless a good game.
summary: Good pinball, but not as good as the pinball on MS Windows

description: Controls are good, display is good, just the flippers are a little lagging and the bump of the on the flippers is too soft. The "Professor" table is confusing, not very interesting, "Tux" is better. But there has to be something more fascinating to not make it boring after a few games.
summary: Nice one, just a little lagging on my old laptop

description:
Good ball physics, paddles feel responsive.

Needs a feature where if you lose your ball in less than a set time (10 seconds, maybe?) it doesn't count like real tables. Ball loss needs a sound effect and delay as a new ball is being prepped. Menus are rough. Took me a bit to figure out how to get my monitor resolution right and I had to check the Github page for controls since the keyboard config screen was just all question marks.
Just think it is Very Bom
Somewhat buggy pinball that thats fun
how can i execute the game?
summary: I could not play because i can not see an icon

description:
Je suis passé en Fedora 25 le 18 nov. 2016
La version Emilia Pinball 0.3.2-4.fc24 ne se lance plus. C'est la version disponible par update mais elle ne se lance pas sur mon poste passé en Fedora 25.
summary: Pinball que j'appréciat sous Fedora 24 ne se lance plus sous Fedora 25

description: On choisit "la table" puis après on joue. Ici dans Fedora 36 Bêta. Je savais pas trop les touches, Enter pour lancer la bille, après j'ai reconfiguré Z et X pour les flippers gauche e droite. Ce n'est pas trop clair ce qu'on fait dans la configuration clavier mais ça a marché pour moi. Espace "tilt" la machine. Il me semble que certaines allées de l'allée de la bille en haut serait supposé changé avec les flippers pour tenter d'allumer toutes les lumières mais ça semblait pas le faire.
summary: Fonctionne, configuration clavier un brin bizarre
